name: Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead / Lenox Park

reviews.title: Good Clean Hotel and decent value
reviews.text: I am a travel agent and stayed here one night Aug 13th. The service at his hotel was pretty good. I will break down the pros and cons.
This was my second stay at this property. I didn't experience most of the problems during my first stay that I did this time.
reviews.title: Could Be Better

reviews.text: PROS: Very convenient to supermarkets, malls, highways and gas stations.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: Very quiet location - no street noise, a pretty, residential area.
reviews.title: Very nice stay at this Residence Inn

reviews.text: Free wireless Internet access in the room
reviews.title: Don't expect a lot from this hotel

likes.disliked: — remote location and very poor shuttle service

aka: Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead / Lenox Park Hotel Atlanta
description: The Residence Inn Buckhead Lenox Park hotel offers 150 spacious suites ideal for both 1-night and extended stay visits. We have perfected the hotel experience by combining all of the comforts of home with our passion for making every guest feel welcome. Our unique setting allows our guests to relax and enjoy the Lenox Park grounds, while being within walking distance of Buckhead shopping, businesses and nightlife.
